channel.title: How good will this mod run?
channel.description:
Hello, I was wondering if BMS will run great with my nVidia Geforce 7300 GT, you guy's do realize that upgrading video cards are not easy. hopefully it will.
Anybody can they please tell how well this will run. It's one of the bestest mods ever and i really want it to run well when it's realeased.

item.title: How good will this mod run?
item.dc:creator: Pixo45
item.description:
eternalness:

So you’ve said for for the 7th time. Just read this.

lets just forget about nvidia and ati, for now, lets discuss on how the mod will run.

Read full topic
item.source: How good will this mod run?

item.title: How good will this mod run?
item.dc:creator: eternalness
item.description:
U can get a 4830 or even a 4850 for that price in some places. Im content with my 4890s, but im hopping to get a 5970 for Christmas, that thing eats the GTX295 for breakfast.

Edit: In B4 Pixo says ATI sucks.

Read full topic
item.source: How good will this mod run?

item.title: How good will this mod run?
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
Do yourself a favor and buy a $50 graphics card like a Radeon 4650 or, even better, a 4670 for like $60. Very respectable performance for the price. Nowhere near that of a $200 gpu, obviously, but easily good enough to run a source game at higher settings.

Read full topic

item.title: How good will this mod run?
item.dc:creator: poundsyourface
item.description:
Yeah it’s definitely gonna be a BM: Slideshow for me…

I can run HL2 at like high everything, but Ep2 is realllly bad.
phewwy on software updates! :retard:

But seriously, I may just have to upgrade my computer 'fore this gets released. Or shortly after I struggle with it for oh idk, a week or so.
